segments.text: I feel a sense of sadness watching this scene unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on her task, missing out on what's happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't see the water overflowing or the kids trying to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she's disconnected from the world, lost in her own thoughts.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is risking his safety for a treat, and she's not there to guide him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl is waiting so patiently, hoping for a cookie from her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would turn around and see what's going on, be a part of their lives.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is filling with water, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she snaps out of it soon, before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a sad reminder of how easy it is to miss out on the important things in life.
segments.speaker: PAR
